title: MSU Public Health
author: Claudia Price
description: The Official Account for MSU Public Health.
cleaned_text: Employees tuned in to the first of a series of town halls aimed at helping members of the community make informed decisions featuring featuring MSU President Samuel L. Stanley Jr., M.D and College of Human Medicine Associate Dean for Public Health Integration Debra Furr-Holden. "If you didn't have a medical home coming into this pandemic, I really encourage people to take that seriously,"
